channel.title: Muslimat Broadcast Network

channel.description: The Muslimat Broadcast Network features issues of concern and interests to the American Muslim Woman. Fashion, Beauty, Home, Decor, Food, Family, Children, Religion, Education, Work and so much more. Our very own Digital Halaqah ! This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: Aisha Abdur Rahman
channel.itunes:subtitle: Muslimat Broadcast Network
channel.itunes:summary: The Muslimat Broadcast Network features issues of concern and interests to the American Muslim Woman. Fashion, Beauty, Home, Decor, Food, Family, Children, Religion, Education, Work and so much more. Our very own Digital Halaqah ! This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:keywords: Islam, Muslim, Women, Education, Digital Halaqah

item.title: EPISODE2- Ramadan Preparation
item.author: aishaladon@gmail.com
item.description: Inshalalh, Rahmadhan is coming soon, and we wanted to sit down at the table with our sisters and discuss how we prepare and get ourselves ready for Rahmadhan.

item.title: EPISODE1-Living With Purpose
item.author: aishaladon@gmail.com
item.description: Allah (swt) has created each of us for a purpose, in order that we provide something to society. What is your purpose in this life, and how does it benefit the Ummah ? Join us Saturday for a live discussion.
item.itunes:author: Aisha Abdur Rahman
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE1-Living With Purpose
item.itunes:summary: Allah (swt) has created each of us for a purpose, in order that we provide something to society. What is your purpose in this life, and how does it benefit the Ummah ? Join us Saturday for a live discussion.
item.itunes:keywords: Islam, Muslim, Women, Education, Digital Halaqah
